text: @piersmorgan So now that Cummings has thoroughly f-ed up UK 🇬🇧 on COVID-19 crisis, he is being ‘promoted’ to f-up Brexit?  With his undivided attention?  Is Boris really THIS pathetic and lazy? Then why does he not just retire for goodness sake?  It MIGHT even save some innocent lives.
